page.title: 11A FARM WORKER.
page.content: As can be seen from the land-use survey agriculture dominates the area around Wisbech.In terms of employment the land is not as important as it was,but some people still have lives that are linked to the land. Jim starts work at 6a.m.when he comes down to a light snack of tea and biscuits.The clothes he wears are overalls,boots and a cap.When he gets to the farm Jim works with machinery such as tractors,crawlers,trailers, ploughs,seed-drills,potato-planters and sprayers.On the land crops such wheat,sugar-beet and potatoes are grown.At harvest time 2 combines are hired to cope with the busiest time of the year as far as Jim is concerned.At the end of the day Jim goes down to the pub for a drink and a chat about his main leisure activity bowls.
